entries.title: Runtime suspended
entries.summary: Runtime development and ingestion work has been indefinitely suspended.
details: Platform-level instability prevented reliable runtime operation.
Dashboard now reflects a frozen, read-only snapshot of final runtime state.

entries.title: Runtime export refresh
entries.summary: Runtime changelog now ships as a committed JSON bundle for static delivery.
details: Pinned runtime changelog exports to a versioned JSON artifact served from GitHub Pages.
Kept dashboard merge logic tolerant of missing runtime payloads while preserving dashboard entries.
Matched scope tagging with dashboard releases so combined views stay consistent.
